name: memory-mcp
description: Persistent memory for Claude. Remember decisions, preferences, and learnings across sessions.
author: Substratia

cloud_api_key.description: Substratia Cloud API key for backup and cross-device sync (get yours at substratia.io/dashboard)

tools.name: memory_recall
tools.description: Search memories by query. Returns past decisions, preferences, and learnings.

tools.name: memory_store
tools.description: Store new memory for future recall. Auto-extracts entities and generates summary.

tools.name: memory_forget
tools.description: Remove a memory by ID (soft delete with audit trail).

tools.name: memory_cloud
tools.description: Manage cloud sync connection for backup and cross-device access.

prompts.startup: Memory plugin ready. I can recall past decisions and preferences, and store new learnings for future sessions. Use memory_recall to search, memory_store to save important context.
